1.content: Here we go! A battle is beginning and you need to prepare for it. So are you a hero or villain? Or maybe you're neutral?
1.title: The long road ahead and those who follow it.

11.content: Calling all heroes! Prepare for battle! So who are you hot shot?
11.title: We need a hero!

111.content: Nintendo. A company you can't go wrong with. So who are you controlling?
111.title: Nintendo

1111.content:
"...I'm a-Mario, I live in the-a Mushroom-a Kingdom with-a my-a princess, Princessa-Peach. I have a brother, named-a Luigi. And we have found that our entirety is beginning to go into a a-terrorizing state... And this is just the beginning of things..."

In the iconic Mushroom Kingdom, Mario meets up with Peach to have a nice little talk. "Oh Mario... That is so sweet of you... Huh???" Both of them hear a rumbling sound over the castle, and to their avail, it's the Subspace Ship/Halberd 2.0. "How were they able to a-rebuild a-it???" Mario questioned himself. "Fear not, but they have even more demented plans..." said a mysterious figure.

"Meta Knight??? And Kirby???" Both Peach and Mario exclaimed. "Poyo." Kirby said to Peach, as she could understand what Kirby was saying. "What?!?! They are sending the entirety into a terrorizing state??? Oh no... we better hurry to somewhere close, maybe the volcano over the mountains???" Peach said as she pointed over the mountains

"Very well... Let's hope to meet new people." Meta Knight said as they traveled towards the volcano.

End of chapter 1...
1111.title: Chapter 1: Terror Arises...

11111.content:
As they reached the volcano, they found an old friend of their's. "Bowser??? What happened to you???" Peach said as she ran over to Bowser to tend to his injuries. "Urrrgh... I've been beaten down, the enemies are too strong..." Bowser said as he was trying to keep himself alive. "Well... Seems like you all need some help with a witch..." Said a statuesque woman.

"Bayonetta???" said Peach, since she is friends with everybody. "I've saw them head over to the mountainous plains, there should be a boat over there..." Bayonetta said as she pointed over the mountainous plains. "No matter what, we must take this force down."

End of chapter 2...
11111.title: Chapter 2: Meeting Friends.

111111.content:
*In the Subspace Factory 2.0*

A statuesque woman busted the vent open, starting to infiltrate the base. "Bingo, they've hid my Power Suit in the computer room, which is the central control room." said the woman, known as Samus. As she reached the energy room, she heard something... "Pika!!!" Screeched a familiar voice. "Pikachu??? Is that you???" Samus said as she was looking in. "Pika." Said the Pikachu.

Samus broke the container Pikachu was in, setting off the emergency alarm. "Well, Well, who do we have here, said an unfamiliar face, who was Tabuu. "I'm afraid I will have to turn you guys into Trophies..." Tabuu said as he pulled out his Off-Wings. Samus and Pikachu froze in horror... "Pikachu, just go on without me, rescue others..." Samus said begging the Pikachu to leave her.

"Piiiiiiika.... CHUUUUUUUUU!!!!!" Pikachu yelled as he started to do a volt tackle to everything in his path. Suddenly, two trophies popped out of Tabuu, which were Mewtwo and Jigglypuff. Samus and Pikachu touched both trophies to reawaken them.

"Puff!!!" Jigglypuff said as she was rambunctious to be reawakened. "Ugh... They will pay for they have for me and my friendship!!!!" Mewtwo said as he and the others were running through the Subspace Factory 2.0 to find more trophies...

End of Chapter 3...
111111.title: Chapter 3:Infiltration

112.content: Sega has had it's share of ups and downs but you can probably look past that if you chose this. Who are you?
112.title: The struggling Sega

1121.content:
Sonic has been through a very rough day because of his terrible games but he sighs when he thinks about his recent games getting better.

He wasn't sure if he could get close to knocking Mario down again but he was going to try.

He decided to visit smash world to see what his rival was up to but what he saw shocked him. He saw the primids attacking the smash mansion.

Sonic beat up some of the primids as he made his way to the mansion. He noticed that a lot of the heroes were missing. He then thought (Those primids must have taken the others.)

Sonic looked around and found an unusual trophy. It was a vixen wearing a blue jump suit with her hand in her fur. Sonic touched the trophy stand and the vixen start waking up.

Sonic then says "I know you. Fox told me about you." The vixen then says "Did you say Fox?" Sonic then asks " Yeah. So what happened here?"

The vixen thought about it and replied "We were talking about the next tournament we were going to do but then those weird things attacked."

Sonic then said "Those were primids." The vixen looked at him and was suddenly mesmerized by his eyes. Sonic notices this and asks "Is there something on my face?"

The vixen replies "No. Not at all." Sonic then asks "But we need to find the others." The vixen then asks "Did you see Fox?"

Sonic replied "Nope. You're the only one I found at the moment. I'm going to search this place some more." The vixen then says "I'll search too."

Sonic nodded and search the mansion alongside the vixen but found nothing. Sonic then says "Damn it! If only i got here faster!"

The vixen replies "Don't beat yourself up. You didn't know we were under attack." Sonic sighed and said "You're right. We should go looking in other places instead."

The vixen says "By the way, my name is Krystal. What's yours?" Sonic replied "The name's Sonic. Sonic the hedgehog!"

Sonic and Krystal then ran across the plains in search of the others but someone was watching.

Meanwhile...

Roy then yawns and says "I'm bored! I need to do something!" Roy was in Pherae castle his father left him.

Roy was trying hard to forget about his short time in Smash world but he couldn't forget the adventures he had with the others.

But he couldn't leave because the kingdom needed him. Roy then heard the door open and Lilina came and asked "Why do you look sad Roy?"

Roy simply replied "There's nothing to do here. The different nations are getting along fine now and it's been peaceful ever since."

Lilina then says "I know what you mean. It's pretty hard to stay calm when this land has had its share of attacks in the past."

Roy then says "I'm thinking about going to smash world to see how the others are doing." Lilina get mads and says "Roy! You can't leave! The people need you!"

Roy sighs and says "I know but I can't help it. I miss those days." Lilina then says in a apologetic voice "I'm sorry. I've been on edge ever since that uprising a few weeks back."

Roy then says "No. It's okay. I need to protect everyone so I can't just get up and leave." Lilina then says "I wish there was a way to let you go to smash world."

Then a voice says "I think you should go." Roy looks up and sees Marcus walking in. Roy then says "You heard that?"

Marcus nods and says "It's always good to have a little fun." Roy then asks "But weren't you the one who said that my responsibility comes first before anything else?"

Marcus replies "I did but if all you do is sit around and mope then the morale of everyone will go down." Roy then says "But..."

Marcus then says "Don't worry. I may be old but I still fight! If anything happens while you're away, I'll take care of it." Roy looked at his mentor and said "Thanks."

Marcus simply replies "Don't mention it. You still have your youth. Have your fight and come back a stronger leader then before." Roy then says "Okay."

Roy then rode a horse to the temple of seals and stood before the sword of seals. Roy then says "I never thought I would draw it out again."

Roy pulled it out and rode to the gate that Master hand left in case he decided he wanted to rejoin the fight. Roy opens the gate and sees Smash world before him.

Roy then says to himself "It's been a long time." Roy then jumped off the horse and ran inside but another figure ran through the gate just as it closed.

In another world...

A shadow could be seen as it moved about. The figure kept moving as a lot of rustling was occurring behind it.

The figure then says "I hope that there are people here who would like my singing." The figure then started moving again as it jumped from tree to tree to avoid any pursuers.
1121.title: Sonic the hegdehog and a returning warrior

11211.content:
Sonic and Krystal were walking across the plains and Krystal asks "What did Fox say about me?" Sonic replied "He told me of your adventure days and about your break up."

Krystal became a little depress upon hearing that and said "Well there was a reason for that." Sonic then says "Oh? Do tell."

Krystal then starts by saying "Well I loved Fox and he loved me back and our love grew with each mission we undertook."

Sonic then asks "So what happened? How did you fall apart? Fox never explained that part to me."

Krystal then says "Probably because he was ashamed of it. I'll tell you once we find a safe place to rest." Sonic then saw a place to set up camp and says "Let's rest at that tree."

They set up near the tree as they look about for primids. Krystal then says "Fox got worried about me and said that the life of the leader of Star fox is dangerous."

Sonic then completes the statement by saying "So he pushed you away to protect you?" Krystal nodded and Sonic thought (That's what I'm doing to...)

Sonic then asks "I'm guessing you didn't take it well." Krystal then says "More like it broke my heart. I couldn't be near him after that but then the Anglar invasion happened."

Sonic then asks "So what happened then?" Krystal then replies "I joined Star wolf, who were team Star fox's rivals."

Sonic then exclaims "What were you thinking!? They were your rivals! How could you do that?"

Krystal then replies "I was hurt back then! Because of Fox, I didn't think it all the way though!"

Sonic then got quiet after hearing that and Krystal continued with "When I ran into Fox again, some part of me wanted to forgive him but my other part wanted nothing to do with him."

Sonic then asks "So did you forgive him?" Krystal then says "Yes. I did but...the guilt I felt from doing what I did wouldn't go away and eventually..."

Sonic then asks "It overwhelmed you. You couldn't live with abandoning your previous life right?"

Krystal simply nodded and said "I owed it to Wolf and the others for helping through what happened with fox. So I couldn't toss them away and I made a hard choice."

Sonic stayed silent for the next part. Krystal then says "I left him to live my life with Wolf and the others. I guess you say I was the strongest member of Star fox that day."

Sonic then asks "You thinking about visiting him every now and then?" Krystal replies "No. I couldn't tease him like that. I'm going to stay with Star Wolf and live my new life."

Sonic then walks away for a minute and then walks back and says "I won't tell you how to live your life but at least visit Fox just to let him know you're okay."

Krystal smiles and says "I could do that or I could send him letters so that I don't have to encounter him again even though I know we'll run into each other one day."

Sonic then says "Good. He'll probably be happy that you'll at least send him something." Krystal then says "Yeah."

Just then, a person appears and Sonic exclaims "Who's there!?" The person then says "Wait! Don't attack!" The person then comes out of the forest nearby....
11211.title: A sad tale and The mysterious stranger

112111.content:
Sonic almost had a nose bleed from seeing the unusual cat girl come out of the bushes. She had hair that looked kinda wild but well kept.

She was practically naked if it wasn't for the fact that her fur covered her breasts.

Krystal was about a smack Sonic for his initial reaction to her appearance but then the cat girl asks "Who are you guys?"

Sonic manages to recover himself and reply "My name is Sonic the hedgehog. But you can call me Sonic."

Krystal then says "My name is Krystal. But I want to ask why you aren't wearing anything?" The cat girl replies "I don't do well with clothes. Especially the fancy ones."

Sonic then sighs and says "Well everyone is entitled to their own opinions."

Then the cat girl says "By the way, my name is Felicia. I was heading to my next concert but I saw this weird portal and got sucked in."

Sonic then says "That's the same thing that happened to me but don't worry. There are some friendly faces here."

Felicia sighs and says "Thanks. I was hoping to get to my next concert but it's looks like I'm going to be late again." Krystal is suddenly confused and asks "Again?"

Felicia then replies "This isn't the first time something weird has happened to me."

They get even more confused and Felicia says "I'll tell you about it later. Right now, I want to know where I am."

Sonic then says "This is Smash world. A world that is connected by multiple dimensions. This is the most probable place you'll end up in if you travel across universes."

Felicia then says "I'm in another universe? I've had that happen to me before." Krystal then says "Let me guess. From your last journey right?"

Felicia then says "Yeah. But how did you know? I didn't even tell you it was a journey." Krystal then says "I'm telepathic. I saw a little of your journey and it's quite interesting."

Felicia smiles and says "Yeah! I can't wait to tell you all about it!" Sonic then asks "By the way, you said you were heading to a concert right? Does that make you an idol?"

Felicia blushes and says "Well...it's more of actress AND idol." Sonic jaw almost dropped and said "Idol and Actress!? That must be difficult!"

Felicia then says "Don't worry. I manage through somehow. After all, I got this far didn't I?" Krystal then says "I must say you must have the most interesting quests."

Felicia then says "Would you like to listen to some of my singing?" Sonic then says "That would be awesome!"

Krystal quickly says "We don't have time for that. Remember what we were doing?" Sonic then says "Oh yeah. We need to find the others!" Felicia then asks "Can I come with you?"

Krystal then asks "Are you any good in a fight?" Felicia smiles and shows her claws and says "These claws aren't just for show!"

Sonic then says "Okay then. Let's get some sleep and we'll fill you in on what were doing in the morning." Felicia says "Okay then."

They set up their tents and made a shelter for Felicia. They went to sleep as Sonic thought about what the others were doing.
112111.title: The amazing Idol and Actress Felicia

1121111.content:
Sonic woke up with a yawn as he decided to go for a run. Sonic then left a dust storm behind him as he went for his early morning run.

Felicia woke up shortly after Sonic left. She then noticed that Krystal was still asleep and Sonic was gone.

Felicia shook Krystal up and Krystal then asks "What is it?" Felicia replied "Sonic's gone!" Krystal then said "Oh. Don't worry about him." Felicia then said "But..."

Krystal then says "He always goes on morning runs. Fox told me so himself." Felicia then asks "Who is Fox?" Krystal then sighed and said "Oh yeah. We haven't filled you in yet."

Krystal then spend one hour explaining what Smash world is and why they were on a journey.

Meanwhile...

Sonic was running around thinking about where their friends could be. He then notices a base nearby and sees some primids come in and out of the base.

Sonic then says to himself "Looks like they made an outpost here." Sonic then hides behind some boxes and looks very closely at the base.

He then notices Lucas and some strange looking person being brought in as trophies. Sonic then says "Good. This is probably a good time to get back some allies."

Sonic looked around and saw that there were only a few primids outside and said "Time to do a Sonic boom!" Sonic then ran back and stopped at an old tree.

He then ran forward as a sonic boom followed him. He ran by the primids so fast, they were all taken out before they knew what hit them.

Sonic examines Lucas and the strange person as he hits their trophy bases. Lucas wakes up and asks "Where am I?" Sonic replies "You're at an outpost made by those primids."

Lucas sees Sonic and says "Sonic! It's so good to see you!" Sonic then asks "What happened?"

Lucas then replies "I'm not sure. We were attacked but we never saw who attacked us." Sonic then says "Wasn't it the primids who attacked you?"

Lucas replied "No. They were just with the people who actually attacked us."

Sonic then says "That doesn't make any sense. Why bring an army if they were going to do it themselves?"

Lucas then replies "I'm not sure but we better figure out why the primids are back." Sonic then asks "But who's this person?"

The strange person then turns to them and says "Thank you for helping me." Sonic then says "But that didn't answer my question."

The strange person then says "Oh! I'm sorry. My name is Lilina. I'm looking for my husband." Sonic then asks "Husband?" Lilina then replies "Yes. His name is Roy."

Lucas then says "Roy? Where have i heard that name before?" Sonic starts thinking about it but Lilina then says "I'm sorry but I must hurry."

Lilina starts wandering off but Sonic stops her and asks "Where are you going?" Lilina replies "To find my husband." Sonic then asks "Then why don't we search together?"

Lilina then says "Well...you did save me so I guess I can let you help." Lucas then says "I'll go with you too!" Lilina then says "I guess that's okay."

Sonic then asks "So what does your husband look like?" Lilina replies "He has red hair, blue armor, and a sword that's infused with fire magic."

Sonic then says "Got it. Let's head back. Lilina then says "Back?" Sonic then says "I have more heroes with me. We'll let them help us out."

Lucas then says with an surprised expression "You found others!?" Sonic then says "Yeah. So let's meet up with them."

They headed back to the camp that he and Krystal set as someone mysterious person arrives at the outpost. The person says "That hedgehog is interfering with our plans."

The voice on the other end says "Don't worry. They weren't really important anyways. The plan can still work without them." The mysterious person then says "I hope you're right."
1121111.title: More help and a plan in motion

Yu narukami or makoto yuki from persona

11521.content:
My name is Kai, I'm 4 feet tall and I have blue eyes and I was a bit shy. I had gotten home from school and put in Super Smash Bros Brawl disc, but when I loaded up the game there was a flash of light and everything went black.
Where do you end you up?
11521.title: Fan character

11522.content:
My name is Poochie a former Simpsons character and also I'm real fat and humongous, but enough about that.

You see my story began in Springfield, that's home to both the Simpsons and everyone who lives there including yours truly.

That was until one day a mysterious beam of light appeared above me and sent me hurtling through into smash world.

After having arrived in smash world, i started wondering where i was at.

Where was i at exactly? I wondered to myself.
11522.title: Fan character

11532.title: Sony characters on the brain

11533.title: More game companies!

115331.content: Plenty of great characters to choose from.
115331.title: Midway

1153311.content: What better way to start off this list than with one of the most iconic characters in video game history? Sub-Zero.
1153311.title: Fighting game legend.

11533111.content:
( Not sure if this will get the chapter deleted, but for anyone unfamiliar with character.)
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s4pIhrqpC5w/UE...

Sub-Zero stood in the courtyard of the Lin Kuei palace, watching the snow fall peacefully. Something was in the air, a feeling hadn't felt since the betray of Frost. As he stood and watched as the air above him seemed to sway like waves, in a bizarre orange color. He felt a strange feeling rise in his body, it felt as though his blood was going to boil. He stared at his arms as he faded into light and vanished.

The Cryomancer slowly awakened to the sound of a feminine voice speaking to him. Realizing it could be a threat he quickly opened his eyes, leaping to his feet. " Peace friend. I have no intention on fighting you." Before him stood a young blue haired woman standing about 5'7 by his judgment with an impressive sword at her hip. He looked around their surroundings consisting of strange ruins.

Sub-Zero looked back to her. " I am Sub-Zero of the Lin Kuei." A cloud of fog permeating from his masked mouth. " Lin Kuei... I am unfamiliar, regardless it is a pleasure to meet you. I am Lucina, daughter of Chrom." She spoke with pride in her voice as she looked up at him.

The two spoke about where they could be currently and began to formulate what they should do, which understandably devolved into "what if" scenarios. As stud spoke he noticed a figure move in one of the ruins. " Someone is watching us." He stated. " There may be someone needing help." Lucina nodded in agreement as she followed him towards the ruins.

Who, or what is watching them?
11533111.title: The Lin Kuei warrior.

choices: A voice congratulates them on being accepted into the tournament.
115331112.content:
The two approach the entrance to the desolate palace. The interior had certainly seen better days as two large holes lay too the left, and right of the entrance. The moonlight illuminated the abandoned building as they investigated.

A dark presence seemed to follow them as they searched. As they approached the entrance to leave, two shadowy figures stood in the middle of the room. Both figures were complete clones of either of the duo. " Gods.... How could this be?" Lucina questioned as she drew her blade.

An otherworldly silence filled the room as the stand off reached it's peak. The two shadow clones rushed at their originals eager to take their place. Sub- Zero ran towards his dopleganger, freezing the floor before him and sliding shoulder first into the imposter, sending it to the ground. He quickly dodged his clone as it attempted to sweep kick his legs. The clone noticeing Lucina in a struggle of her own attempted to hurl an ice cloud at her, only to have his original redirect the attack back at it, freezing it. Sub-Zero quickly created a club of ice and brought it down onto the imposters shoulder, shattering the frozen being. Unfortunately this was only a annoyance for the specter as it reformed once more as its opponent turned his back.

It rushed at him with unnatural movements as it tackled him to the ground, landing on the edge of the pit. It climbed ontop of Tundra and began ferociously striking his face. Sub-Zero grabbed the imposters fist before striking its throat, before shoving it into the pit, where it would stay. He then turned too see how Lucina was doing.

Lucina dodged her imposters swipe at her feet and nearly step right off the platform. Her clone drew its leg to kick her only to suddenly slip on a puddle of ice, falling to the ground. Lucina leapt onto it plunging her sword into the shadows chest. She placed her boot on the beasts ribs and gave it a kick into the pit.

As they stood recovering the temples torchs suddenly lite up, as if they had always been there. As they stand confused they are even moreso when
115331112.title: Something far more sinister.

choices: Finding away out of this madness.
1153311121.content:
" Well done champions! Impressive, if not surprising." The look skyward in an attempt to find the voice, only to find a floating orb. " What is the meaning of this. Do you take this as amusing?" Lucina hissed at the orb out of anger from being toyed with. " Yes, quite amusing, that is why you are here." This time Sub-Zero spoke up. " Kill me or release me phantom, but do not waste my time with talk." The orb seemed to change to a crimson shade of red. " I have no use of you dead, not yet. I come to congratulate you both on being accepted into the "Tournament of Legends." You were selected for skill, determination, and combat prowess. You both are founders of Blue team, you may recruit as you wish. Be aware that you are only one of two blue teams and you will face the second, even if it is only the two of you. Until that time, may you find good fortune." With that the orb flew off leaving the champions with more questions the answers.

What should their next course of action be?
1153311121.title: A voice congratulates them on being accepted in...

135311.content:
One day, u r playing super smash bros 4 when suddenly, your system started to glow and everything went black. You later wake up in a grassy field. You get up and look around.
You: where am I?
What know?
135311.title: Neutral Author

1353112.content:
You decide to walk around and try to find some help. After walking for a while, you come across a character
Who is it?

13531121.content:
You walk around a hill and see... princess peach?! She is picking some flowers and doesn't notice you. Then it hits you, you have been teleported into the game!
Peach: excuses me
You look and see that peach has finished picking flowers and saw you
Peach: can I help you?

Peach: nice to meet you. Come with me back to the mansion.

What next?
13531121.title: princess peach

13533.content: Choosing someone is difficult but it can prove interesting so choose.
13533.title: Another choice helps

info.brief_description: When Smash world is under attack, You must take the fight to your enemy.
info.description:
Smash world is under attack! You must take on the identity of one of the heroes or villains and decide Smash World's fate!

Rules:

1. You are allowed to put in any character as long as that character is from a game or anime.

2. You are allowed to put yourself in as long as you explain how it happened.

3. You are allowed to control a party of characters but no huge team ups until you have at least six chapters.

4. You can make a pairing with any characters you want but no gays. (Lesbians are okay in my book.)

Try to be creative and put as many fight scenes as you can and try to make them epic. This place is for people trying to improve their typing skills.

I will gladly give you pointers if you ask. So let's get ready to break things!
